医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
空气污染：紧迫的全球健康危机，需要采取紧急跨学科行动该研究强调了空气污染对健康的严重影响，并强调迫切需要跨学科研究和循证干预措施来减轻这些影响，特别是在弱势群体和低收入和中等收入国家。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240728/Air-pollution-a-pressing-global-health-crisis-demanding-urgent-interciplin-action.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240728/Air-pollution-a-pressing-global-health-crisis-demanding-urgent-interciplin-action.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=80253f39-6f72-4f08-9270-e89027a304e5 Sun, 28 Jul 2024 22:17:00 -0400 Air pollution: a pressing global health crisis demanding urgent interdisciplinary action
母乳中的巨细胞病毒与婴儿生长和肠道微生物组的变化有关研究表明，母乳中的人类巨细胞病毒 (CMV) 重新激活会影响乳汁成分、婴儿肠道微生物群和生长，并对新生儿健康产生潜在影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240728/Cytomegalovirus-in-breast-milk-linked-to-changes-in-infant-growth-and-gut-microbiome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240728/Cytomegalovirus-in-breast-milk-linked-to-changes-in-infant-growth-and-gut-microbiome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=103b25ff-6749-4b33-b68f-f75c47d8a4f3 Sun, 28 Jul 2024 21:27:00 -0400 Cytomegalovirus in breast milk linked to changes in infant growth and gut microbiome
机器学习彻底改变了帕金森病症状跟踪和进展预测研究开发了一种自动化系统，利用机器学习来量化帕金森病的运动症状并预测疾病进展，从而提供新的治疗见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240728/Machine-learning-revolutionizes-Parkinsons-disease-symptom-tracking-and-progression-prediction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240728/Machine-learning-revolutionizes-Parkinsons-disease-symptom-tracking-and-progression-prediction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f4aeca05-07e7-4a51-80f5-4f3c6871f6fb Sun, 28 Jul 2024 21:17:00 -0400 Machine learning revolutionizes Parkinson's disease symptom tracking and progression prediction
研究发现遗传因素是中风后心血管风险的关键研究确定了初次中风后心血管结局的遗传和分子危险因素，发现了改善患者预后的潜在治疗目标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240728/Study-finds-genic-factors-key-to-post-中风-cardioangio-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240728/Study-finds-genic-factors-key-to-post-中风-cardioangio-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4af59ca4-04e1-4bf1-803d-bf2ca5425cad Sun, 28 Jul 2024 20:56:00 -0400 Study finds genetic factors key to post-stroke cardiovascular risks
研究强调母乳捐赠的情感益处和挑战研究表明，捐赠母乳对母亲的健康有积极影响，而那些无法捐赠的人往往会经历沮丧和拒绝等负面情绪https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240728/Research-highlights-emotional-benefits-and-challenges-of-breast-milk-donation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240728/Research-highlights-emotional-benefits-and-challenges-of-breast-milk-donation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d7e33f7c-8c4c-45fa-8e84-8b129c212204 Sun, 28 Jul 2024 20:46:00 -0400 Research highlights emotional benefits and challenges of breast milk donation
研究发现身体成分影响神经退行性疾病风险研究表明，身体成分模式会影响神经退行性疾病的风险，其中某些模式与心血管疾病的风险增加有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240728/Study-finds-body-composition-impacts-neurodogenic-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240728/Study-finds-body-composition-impacts-neurodogenic-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=04a82185-eb6c-44de-9081-91eac91c2fd1 Sun, 28 Jul 2024 20:33:00 -0400 Study finds body composition impacts neurodegenerative disease risk
科学家探索导致 SMA 的早期生命因素脊髓性肌萎缩症（SMA）是一种严重的神经系统疾病，尽管目前的疗法可以缓解症状，但目前尚无法治愈。为了寻找更好的治疗方案，DZNE 和德累斯顿工业大学的科学家们现在正在提请人们注意以前未被注意到的胚胎发育异常。他们的论点基于对所谓类器官的研究：可以重建疾病过程的实验室培养的组织培养物。他们的研究结果发表在《细胞报告医学》杂志上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240727/Scientists-explore-early-life-factors-contributing-to-SMA.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240727/Scientists-explore-early-life-factors-contributing-to-SMA.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f7217af-3c29-42e7-84ae-2dd647892ece Sat, 27 Jul 2024 01:48:10 -0400 Scientists explore early life factors contributing to SMA
新研究调查了儿童教育受到的干扰由于住院时间延长，有特殊医疗保健需求的儿童 (CSHCN) 的教育常常面临严重中断。凯斯勒基金会和儿童专科医院的多学科团队于 2024 年 7 月 1 日在《残疾与康复》在线发表了一项最新研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240727/New-study-examines-educational-disruptions-for-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240727/New-study-examines-educational-disruptions-for-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1010a609-e913-4566-accb-00b4086eadea Sat, 27 Jul 2024 01:30:10 -0400 New study examines educational disruptions for children
突破性疗法治愈脊髓损伤2021 年 11 月，西北大学研究人员推出了一种可注射的新疗法，该疗法利用快速移动的“跳舞分子”来修复组织并逆转严重脊髓损伤后的瘫痪。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240727/Breakthrough-therapy-heals-spinal-cord-injuries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240727/Breakthrough-therapy-heals-spinal-cord-injuries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=525f0869-a30f-4cf3-bbdb-af3d4177f69c Sat, 27 Jul 2024 01:10:38 -0400 Breakthrough therapy heals spinal cord injuries
结直肠癌治疗的创新双药策略两种药物的组合能够以非常规方式抑制肿瘤。该策略不是像最广泛使用的药物那样抑制肿瘤细胞分裂，而是过度激活这些细胞的致癌信号，直至它们受到压力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240727/Innovative-dual-drug-strategy-for-colorectal-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240727/Innovative-dual-drug-strategy-for-colorectal-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ed7ec906-2c7c-414f-94e5-54b03aa4b8c2 Sat, 27 Jul 2024 01:07:00 -0400 Innovative dual-drug strategy for colorectal cancer treatment
